title: Add address to Contact section

requirements.text: Add the address 'Akurdi near Khandoba Mandir, Pimpri Chinchwad, Pune 411035' as plain text in the Contact page (frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx), displayed consistently with the existing text styling on that page. No additional contact details should be added.

quotes: My adress is Akurdi near khandoba mandir pimpri Chinchwad Pune 411035

acceptanceCriteria: The address 'Akurdi near Khandoba Mandir, Pimpri Chinchwad, Pune 411035' is visible in the Contact section/page.
The address is rendered as plain text, styled consistently with other text content on the Contact page.
No phone number, email, or other contact details are added alongside the address.
No other sections or pages are affected.

constraints: Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Do not add any contact details other than the specified address.
nonGoals: Adding phone number or email to the Contact section.
Styling the address as a contact card or with special labels.
Adding the address to any other page or section (e.g., footer, about).
